name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch Party - Watch Together on Netflix, Youtube, Hulu, HBO

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch TV together with your friends. Have a watch party on Netflix, Youtube, Disney Plus, Hulu, HBO,and Amazon Prime.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch Together enables you to watch Netflix, Youtube, Hulu, Disney Plus, HBO Max, with your friends and loved ones online. Your videos are synced automatically even when you switch videos while watching. Install the extension and start sharing moments together even when you're thousands of miles apart.

Watch Together is a browser extension for watching TV remotely with friends, e.g., for movie nights with that long-distance special someone. It synchronizes video playback and adds group chat to your favorite streaming sites.

1. Install the Chrome extension 

2. Create a Chat Room 
Go to website of Netflix, Youtube, Hulu, Disney Plus, HBO Max, click on the extension icon, and then click 'Create Chat Room'.

3. Share the link
Click on 'copy link' and send the link to the people who you want to watch together with.

4. Enjoy the show
That's it! The extension will automatically sync the playback of your video. You can chat in the sidebar.
